summary: ICP canister-based holistic wellness + fitness tracker app with Internet Identity authentication, daily logging, reminders, progress dashboards, and a professional marketing-focused landing page (React + shadcn/ui frontend, Motoko backend).

existing_features.title: Internet Identity authentication and actor/session hooks
existing_features.description: Frontend authentication flow using Internet Identity with actor creation/hooks for authenticated canister calls; includes auth landing and initial profile setup dialog.

existing_features.title: User profile setup (onboarding dialog)
existing_features.description: First-run/profile setup UI to collect basic user information after authentication.

existing_features.title: Dashboard view with at-a-glance status
existing_features.description: Main dashboard screen aggregating key wellness/exercise information and entry points into logs, progress, and reminders.

existing_features.title: Daily logging for exercise and wellness
existing_features.description: Daily logs UI with forms/sections for entering exercise and wellness metrics; includes date picker utilities.

existing_features.title: Reminders management and due reminders banner
existing_features.description: Create/list reminders and show a banner for reminders due; includes reminder utility helpers.

existing_features.title: Progress analytics with charts
existing_features.description: Progress screen showing charted trends for exercise and wellness data over time.

existing_features.title: App layout/navigation shell
existing_features.description: Application layout with navigation structure for major sections (dashboard, logs, reminders, progress).

existing_features.title: Backend authorization and access control mixins (Motoko)
existing_features.description: Motoko backend authorization/access control components integrated into the canister backend.

existing_features.title: Build/deploy template for ICP React + Motoko project
existing_features.description: Repository includes a reusable build template (frontend/backed canister configs, scripts for asset resizing/pruning, and deployment scaffolding).

existing_features.title: Rebrand the product name to "Alex Health" across the unauthenticated landing page, authenticated app shell (header/nav), and HTML metadata so the name is consistent in all visible UI and browser surfaces (e.g., page title, headings, logo alt text).

Enhance the unauthenticated front page (landing) with additional professional marketing content focused on dieting and exercising, including concrete examples of plans and documentation (e.g., sample meal-plan structure, workout-plan structure, and what users will track/log) and clear value propositions about improving lifestyle outcomes.

Apply a cohesive, professional visual theme across the landing page and authenticated app UI (typography scale, spacing, component styling, and a consistent accent color direction) to make the product feel "really beautiful" without introducing new app features.

Improve post-login usability and visual polish in the authenticated app shell and key views by refining navigation clarity, layout hierarchy, and empty/loading states so the app is easy to use immediately after login (desktop and mobile).

new_feature_requests.summary: Brand the site as "Alex health" (update app/site name across the UI, landing page, and metadata).
Enhance the front page with professional marketing content and concrete examples focused on dieting and exercising, emphasizing lifestyle change through plans and documentation.
Improve post-login UX/UI to be very professional, easy to use, and visually beautiful (polish layout, navigation, and overall design consistency).

architectural_notes: Frontend: React + Vite + Tailwind + shadcn/ui component library.
Auth: Internet Identity used for login; authenticated actor hooks for canister calls.
Backend: Motoko canister with authorization/access-control modules.
Project includes ICP build/deploy template (icp.yaml, Dockerfile, deploy script) and image resize/prune tooling.
